content: **knitted half-length socks for children with rib in drops fiesta sizes 24 43 ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fs-001-bn yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 24/25-26/28-29/31-32/34-35/37-38/40-41/43 foot-length 15-17-18-20-22-24-26 cm leg-height approx 9-10-12-14-16-17-18 cm **yarn** drops fiesta from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-100-100-100-150-150 g colour 14 rainbow sprinkles **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
